DOC.brief_summary: Korean American ( KA ) woman among high breast cancer mortality rate lowest breast cancer screen rate U.S. American woman across racial/ethical group . This innovative project seek harness mobile phone technology mean take preventative health care new level among population . Using Fogg Behavioral Model study propose develop mobile phone-based intervention design motivate KA woman undergo annual mammogram ( mMammogram ) . The overall study aim develop assess feasibility effectiveness 7-day long mMammogram intervention design persuade KA woman undergo breast cancer screening .
DOC.brief_title: Mobile Phone Multimedia Messaging Intervention Breast Cancer Screening
DOC.detailed_description: Specific aim three-year period include follow : ( 1 ) The first year devote intervention protocol development . A major emphasis year 1 develop community advisory board ( CAB ) , conduct series pre-intervention focus group , work pertinent persuasive technology consultant develop pilot-test intervention . ( 2 ) The second year first half third year focus delivery intervention . ( 3 ) second half third year devote data analysis dissemination .
DOC.criteria: Korean American immigrant woman Aged 4079 Residence Minnesota Possession mobile phone textmessage function Possession active email account Mammogram receipt within past 2 year
